alert.note: Alert for Bay; Midland (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 24 at 3:55PM EDT until April 24 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: The National Weather Service in Detroit/Pontiac has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Bay County in southeastern Michigan... Northern Midland County in southeastern Michigan... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 355 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Coleman, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Edenville around 410 PM EDT. Bentley around 425 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Mount Forest, Hope and North Bradley. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
